channel.title: Culture on George Hadjiyiannis
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on George Hadjiyiannis

item.title: Evolving Team Culture
item.description: Team culture is one of those things that gets talked about a lot when it is not quite right, but rarely worked on effectively. Yet so much of the outcome in the end depends on team culture. I bet that the majority of the people reading this article have experienced teams working in their own silos. Think about the influence it has on the ability of the company to drive successful outcomes.
